DialogDescription.title: Text description displayed in the Update Dialog
DialogDescription.description: The text description displayed in the Update Dialog

UpdateButtonLabel.title: Label of the Update button
UpdateButtonLabel.description: The text label that is displayed in the update button (default is “Update”)

DeferButtonLabel.title: Label of the Deferral button
DeferButtonLabel.description: The text label that is displayed in the deferral button (default is “Later”)

ContentImagePath.title: Content Image path
ContentImagePath.description: Local path of an image to be displayed as an alternative to the App’s icon (PNG/TIFF/GIF/JPG)

DialogTimeout.title: Custom Update Dialog timeout
DialogTimeout.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that the Update Dialog will be displayed before a timeout occurs (default is 600 seconds)

DialogHelpText.title: Enable the Help button and display text
DialogHelpText.description: Enable the Help button and display text to give end-users more information

DialogHelpToolTip.title: On-hover tooltip for the Help button
DialogHelpToolTip.description: Display an on-hover tooltip for the Help button (available when DialogHelpText is configured)

DialogTitle.title: Title of the Update Dialog
DialogTitle.description: Specify a title for the Update Dialog (by default this isn’t shown)
